parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the item which won't be visible

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text used to search and match with the entry

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The array of keys of the item which won't be visible

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The array of text values used to search and match with the entry

getSelectedKey.description: Retrieves the selected key from the parameters

getSelectedText.description: Retrieves the selected Text from the parameteres

getValue.description: Retrieves the value on the input field which may not have a match

removeAllItems.description: Removes all items in the list

removeItem.description: Removes a specific item from the list via the key

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key to identify the entry

setInputStyle.description: Overwrites the default style attribute of the input field

parameters.name: styleStr
parameters.description: String with one or multiple style entries

setListStyle.description: Overwrites the default style attribute of the lists in the search

parameters.name: styleStr
parameters.description: String with one or multiple style entries

setListLimit.description: Sets the maximum matching entries shown at the same time

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Sets the maximum matching entries shown at the same time

setPlaceholder.description: Sets a placeholder on the input field when it is empty

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text that will be visible when the field is empty

setSelectedKey.description: Sets the input with a text value based on the provided key

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key to identify the entry

onSelect.description: Called when a user selects an entry from the list via click or enter or writes fully the text value
